      AbstractBlog BlogManager.findBlog​(AbstractBlogPost post, com.jalios.jcms.Member loggedMember)
      Finds a readable Blog for given member among post's attached workspaces.
      Returns post's Blog by default if post is attached to no other workspaces.
      AbstractBlog BlogManager.findBlog​(AbstractBlogPost post, com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ctxWorkspace, com.jalios.jcms.Member loggedMember)
      Finds a readable Blog for given member, and contextual workspace.
      Returns accessible Blog in workspace by default, else, searches for a Blog if post is attached to other workspaces.

      void BlogManager.notify​(AbstractBlogPost post, com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr)
      Notifies PublicationFollower of the AbstractBlog that there's a new BlogPost in the Blog
      void BlogManager.notifyUpdate​(AbstractBlogPost post, com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr)
      Notifies PublicationFollower of the AbstractBlog that the BlogPost has been updated
